content: That's really helpful information. I've been noticing that my age is affecting my social life too. I've recently joined a book club and attended some concerts and music festivals, which seem to attract a slightly older crowd. I've noticed that I'm no longer the youngest person in the room, and that's been a bit of an adjustment for me. Can you tell me more about the demographics of people attending concerts and music festivals, and how they've changed over time?
